## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{klagqks0}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 546825845720868867295927039329983785473446600801331534924261384245136114828627832514378019654584479273019277374768999350625545538898435504156441135555108
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
